name: Planet Surf: The Last Wave
description:
Planet Surf: The Last Wave is a physics/arcade/surf game on space! The ultimate surf trip!

Ride the planet's last wave while dodging deadly meteors! You have 3 minutes to collect enough energy crystals before the planet explodes.

  • Ride endless waves!
  • Dodge deadly meteors!
  • Surf in unique planets!
  • Beat your friend's score with planet specific leaderboards!
  • Original soundtrack!
  • Become the best surfer in the galaxy!
